headline: FirstEnergy lays off workers in Ohio and 4 other states
summary: FirstEnergy on Aug. 27 laid off fewer than 50 workers in support roles in Ohio, Pennsylvania, West Virginia, Maryland and New Jersey.

raw.headline: FirstEnergy lays off workers in Ohio and 4 other states
raw.summary: FirstEnergy on Aug. 27 laid off fewer than 50 workers in support roles in Ohio, Pennsylvania, West Virginia, Maryland and New Jersey.

headline: FirstEnergy Customers Can Get Help with Summer Electric Bills
summary: Staying cool during Ohio's hot summer months shouldn't cause financial stress. That's why Ohio Edison, The Illuminating Company and Toledo Edison, subsidiaries of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE), are encouraging residential customers to take advantage of the Home Energy Assistance (HEAP) Summer Crisis Program, available for a limited time.

headline: Potomac Edison Residential Customers in Maryland to Receive Legislative Energy Relief Refund Bill Credits
summary: Potomac Edison residential customers in Maryland will see some relief on their electric bills through the Legislative Energy Relief Refund, created as part of the Next Generation Energy Act passed in April by the Maryland General Assembly. The credits are intended to help ease the burden of rising electricity costs for families.

headline: FirstEnergy Names Brooke Trammell Vice President, Transmission Strategy & Engagement
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) has named Brooke Trammell as Vice President, Transmission Strategy and Engagement. Trammell will oversee strategic planning, policy advocacy and strategic ventures to expand FirstEnergy's transmission portfolio. She will also lead FirstEnergy's engagement with PJM and manage its transmission strategic partnerships. Trammell will report to Mark Mroczynski, FirstEnergy President, Transmission.
